H0.text: Sulfur and nitrogen are the pair most necessary for life to develop on another planet.

H1.text: Helium and hydrogen are the pair most necessary for life to develop on another planet.

H2.text: Liquid water and carbon are the most necessary pair for life to develop on another planet.

H3.text: Chlorophyll and oxygen are the pair most necessary for life to develop on another planet.
